column4: Hi. Just caught your last comment. When you plug in earphones, sound still comes out speaker?  Is this a hardware problem?  Does the problem exist under Windows (if you have dual-boot installed)?
Yes, sound still comes out of the speaker when I plug in headphones. I don't think that it's a hardware problem because it works in Windows. Yes, I have a dual boot installation.
Interesting.  So it is under software control. Do you think it's a driver problem for the sound card?  (ie. your sound card needs a special driver found only under Windows?)
Yeah, I think I need a special driver.
